name: DeepFest Riyadh
description: DeepFest Riyadh is one of the world’s fastest‑growing AI and technology conferences, co‑located with the LEAP Tech Event in Saudi Arabia. Powered by the Saudi Authority for Data and Artificial Intelligence (SDAIA) and organised by Tahaluf & Co., DeepFest brings together AI researchers, developers, innovators, engineers, and decision‑makers from across the globe. The event features keynote sessions, workshops, exhibits, and deep dives into cutting‑edge topics like generative AI, robotics, ethics, and real‑world AI adoption. With over 68,000 attendees in 2025, it has become a key meeting point for the global AI community.
